Visualisation Tool for Instance Dependencies
This mini-tool can be used to visualise dependency graphs of objects that are generated by the RandomGraphGenerator. This tools allows to inspect the random graphs generated for given seed and basis parameters. The core generation logic of the test suite is to be found in the RandomGraphGenerator.js file and is shared by this visualisation and the test code.

Press Random to generate a new random graph (new seed).
Press Render to render the graph for the specified parameters.
